scripts.deploy: npm run build:clean && npm run t2:erase; npm run build:device && npm run config && npm run copy && cd build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run t2:push
scripts.run:local: npm run build:clean && npm run build:device && npm run config && npm run copy && cd build/; export QTEST=1;node index.js
scripts.run:device: npm run build:clean && npm run build:device && npm run config && npm run copy && cd build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run t2:run
